TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebHealthVaultConnection implements class Microsoft.HealthVault.Connection.IHealthVaultConnection, class Microsoft.HealthVault.Rest.IHealthVaultRestAuthorizer
type IWebHealthVaultConnection = interface interface IHealthVaultConnection interface IHealthVaultRestAuthorizer

Docs.summary: Represents an authenticated interface to HealthVault.
Docs.remarks: Most operations performed against the service require authentication. A connection must be made to HealthVault to access the web methods that the service exposes. The implementation class does not maintain an open connection to the service. It uses XML over HTTP to make requests and receive responses from the service. The connection just maintains the data necessary to make the request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserAuthToken As String

Docs.remarks: This is the credential token retrieved from the HealthVault platform. By specifying a User Auth Token, the web application credential can operate in the context of an authenticated user.
